snippet: Executive Health Resources, a consultant owned by UnitedHealth Group, assists hospitals with winning larger payments from Medicare.
abstract: Executive Health Resources, little-known consultant owned by health insurance giant UnitedHealth Group, is flourishing by helping hospitals exploit what they describe as gray area in Medicare payments for hospital stays; consultant is often at center of battles between hospitals and Medicare over how facilities bill.
lead_paragraph: Executive Health Resources, a consultant owned by UnitedHealth Group, assists hospitals with winning larger payments from Medicare.

headline.main: UnitedHealth, an Insurer Switching Roles, Helps Hospitals on Medicare Billing
headline.print_headline: Insurer, Switching Roles, Helps Hospitals on Medicare Billing
